project_abstract.cdata: The Fourth Bogota Water Supply and Sewerage Project will the Bank's past efforts to provide essential water supply and sewerage infrastructure for Bogota.  It will consist of:  (a) construction of a major water transmission tunnel and main; (b) primary water distribution system reinforcements; as well as (c) water distribution system rehabilitation.  Furthermore, the project will provide for; (d) additions to water, sewage and drainage networks for low-income neighborhoods; (e) a reservoir for untreated raw water storage; (f) metered house connections; and (g) technical assistance for the institutional improvement of EAAB.  Finally, the venture will include; (h) implementation planning for a project to control flooding and pollution of the Bogota River.
